titles.title: Start Healthy Act of 2013
To amend title XIX of the Social Security Act to provide medical assistance to uninsured newborns under the Medicaid program, and for other purposes.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Energy and Commerce.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Health.

bill.summary: 11/21/2013--Introduced. Start Healthy Act of 2013 - Amends title XIX (Medicaid) of the Social Security Act (SSA) to provide: (1) mandatory coverage of qualified (uninsured) newborns, and (2) 100% federal medical assistance percentage (FMAP) for temporary coverage of such newborns.
